name: Snake Chase Sim
description:
Enter the open world as a huge snake as he makes his way across the desert looking for some easy prey. Fight off Tigers, Cheetahs, Roosters, and Scorpions. Help him grow from a weak snake into an undefeatable opponent. You will develop your hunting skills the more you play.
App Highlights:
--Thrive in this huge 3D Desert Open World Landscape
--9 Different Desert Animals included
--Dynamic times of day and Rain
--Upgrade your Snake Speed, Strength, and Stamina
--12 Mind Bending Adventures
--6 Special Battle Scenarios in Survival Mode
DYNAMIC CONDITIONS
Experience a different game every time you play. No two games will ever be the same.
UPGRADE YOUR VIPER
Spend your meat points to increase your Strength, Stamina, and Speed
SPECIAL BATTLE SCENARIOS
Try to Survive these challenging battles.
9 DESERT ANIMALS INCLUDED
Cheetah, Zebra, Chicken, Rabbit, Snake, and Scorpion
FANTASTIC 3D GAMEPLAY
Easy to understand gameplay, with epic 3D graphics and open world style.
